actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration Integrity, Security, and Enforcement

official_title: To increase the numerical limitation on the number of asylees whose status may be adjusted to that of an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence.
short_title: Increase in Numerical Limitation for Asylees Adjustment Act of 2005

summary.text: Increase in Numerical Limitation for Asylees Adjustment Act of 2005 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to increase the annual limitation on the number of asylees who may adjust to permanent legal resident status.

titles.title: Increase in Numerical Limitation for Asylees Adjustment Act of 2005
Increase in Numerical Limitation for Asylees Adjustment Act of 2005
To increase the numerical limitation on the number of asylees whose status may be adjusted to that of an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence.
